changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_character_info') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_character_info GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_character_info @character_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
-- character info.
SELECT c.nickname, c.class, c.zone_id, c.pos_x, c.pos_y, c.pos_z, c.pos_heading, c.sex, c.current_level, c.level_step, c.exp, c.sp, c.hp, c.mp, c.cp, c.recovery_cp, c.character_state, c.chaotic, c.is_actionbar_lock, c.mercenary_point, ISNULL(gm.guild_id, 0), c.arena_point, c.deserter_expired_at, c.beginner_protection, c.max_bind_recall_count FROM dbo.Characters AS c LEFT OUTER JOIN Guild_Members AS gm ON c.id = gm.character_id LEFT OUTER JOIN Guilds AS g ON g.id = gm.guild_id WHERE c.id = @character_id AND c.delete_on = 0
-- Quest Item SELECT q.id, q.quest_item_code, q.usable_count, q.quest_code FROM dbo.Quest_Inventories AS q INNER JOIN dbo.Characters AS c ON q.character_id = c.id WHERE q.character_id = @character_id AND c.delete_on = 0
-- inventory SELECT i.inven_type, i.id, i.item_code, i.slot_id, i.item_count, i.expire_at FROM dbo.Inventories AS i INNER JOIN dbo.Characters AS c ON i.character_id = c.id WHERE i.character_id = @character_id AND c.delete_on = 0
-- equip item SELECT e.inven_type, e.inventory_id, e.fragment_count, e.open_socket_count, e.socket_skill_code_1, e.socket_skill_code_2, e.socket_skill_code_3, e.socket_skill_code_4, e.socket_skill_code_5 FROM dbo.EquipItemInfos AS e INNER JOIN Characters AS c ON e.character_id = c.id WHERE e.character_id = @character_id AND c.delete_on = 0
-- equipment SELECT e.equip_part, e.inventory_id FROM dbo.Equipments AS e INNER JOIN dbo.Characters AS c ON e.character_id = c.id WHERE e.character_id = @character_id AND c.delete_on = 0
-- accessories SELECT a.accessory_part, a.inventory_id FROM dbo.Accessories AS a INNER JOIN dbo.Characters AS c ON a.character_id = c.id WHERE a.character_id = @character_id AND c.delete_on = 0
-- skill SELECT s.skill_code FROM dbo.Skills AS s INNER JOIN dbo.Characters AS c ON s.character_id = c.id WHERE s.character_id = @character_id AND c.delete_on = 0
-- action bar SELECT a.code_0, a.code_1, a.code_2, a.code_3, a.code_4, a.code_5, a.code_6, a.code_7, a.code_8, a.code_9, a.code_10, a.code_11 FROM dbo.ActionBars AS a INNER JOIN dbo.Characters AS c ON a.character_id = c.id WHERE a.character_id = @character_id AND c.delete_on = 0 ORDER BY count_id
-- game money SELECT g.game_money, g.bank_game_money FROM dbo.GameMonies AS g INNER JOIN dbo.Characters AS c ON g.character_id = c.id WHERE g.character_id = @character_id AND c.delete_on = 0
-- bind recall SELECT b.link_id, b.data_code, b.world_map_code, b.pos_x, b.pos_y, b.pos_z FROM dbo.Bind_Recall_Infos AS b INNER JOIN dbo.Characters AS c ON b.character_id = c.id WHERE b.character_id = @character_id AND c.delete_on = 0
-- cooldown SELECT i.data_code, i.expire_at FROM dbo.Cooldown_Infos AS i INNER JOIN dbo.Characters AS c ON i.character_id = c.id WHERE i.character_id = @character_id AND c.delete_on = 0
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_character_info') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_character_info GO
